en.description: Graduated as a graphic designer in 2018 from the Higher Institute of Design of the University of Havana (ISDi) and currently studying the master's degree in UX-UI in Barcelona

es.description: Graduado de diseño gráfico en 2018 del Instituto Superior de Diseño de la Universidad de la Habana(ISDi) y actualmente realizando el máster en UX-UI en Barcelona
